headline: Zensai Named a 2025 World Future Award Winner Among Top 100 AI Tech Companies
summary: Zensai, the only AI-powered learning, employee engagement, and performance management platform built on Azure and integrated into Microsoft 365 and Teams, today announced it has been named to the World Future Awards' official Top 100 AI Tech Companies of 2025 list. This prestigious recognition honors the most forward-thinking organizations advancing the field of artificial intelligence and highlights Zensai's Human Success Platform, which is redefining the future of AI-powered learning and perfo

headline: Three Link Solutions Names Andrew Pettit as Canadian Country Leader
summary: DALLAS, July 16, 2025--Three Link announced the appointment of Andrew Pettit as its new Canadian Country Leader.
